external_id.description: The external identifier of the contract to retrieve.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of relationships to include in the response; supported values are `contract_type`, `spend_category`, `supplier_company`, `docusign_envelopes`, and `adobe_sign_agreements`.

name: get_contract_by_id
description: Retrieve details of a specific contract by its internal ID.

id.description: The internal ID of the contract to retrieve.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of relationships to include in the response; supported values are `contract_type`, `spend_category`, `supplier_company`, `docusign_envelopes`, `adobe_sign_agreements`.

name: get_contract_fields_description
description: Retrieve all available fields for the contract object.

name: get_contract_milestone_report_schema
description: Retrieves the contract milestone report schema, defining the structure and expected data types for each field in a contract milestone report entry.

name: get_contract_report_entries
description: Retrieves a list of contract report entries, which are aggregated data related to contract performance, values, timelines, or milestones.

name: get_contract_report_schema
description: Retrieves the schema definition for contract report entries, outlining available fields, their types, and data structure for dynamic interpretation or building UIs and integrations.

name: get_contract_type_by_external_id
description: Retrieve details of a specific contract type by its external ID.

external_id.description: External ID of the contract type to retrieve.

name: get_contract_type_by_id
description: Retrieve details of a specific contract type by its internal ID.

id.description: The internal ID of the contract type to retrieve.

name: get_event_by_id
description: Retrieve details of a specific event.

id.description: The unique identifier of the event to retrieve.

name: get_event_report_entries_by_report_id
description: Retrieve a paginated list of event report entries for a specific event report identified by `event_report_id`.

event_report_id.description: Unique identifier for the event report to retrieve entries from.

name: get_event_report_schema
description: Retrieves the schema definition for event report entries, providing field names and data types for dynamic interpretation and rendering.

name: get_event_template_by_id
description: Retrieves event template details by ID.

id.description: Unique internal identifier of the event template.

name: get_event_worksheet_by_id
description: Retrieves an existing worksheet's details by its unique worksheet and associated event identifiers.

event_id.description: Unique identifier of the event to which the worksheet belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the worksheet to retrieve.

name: get_event_worksheet_line_item_by_id
description: Retrieve details for an existing line item using its unique identifier provided at creation.

event_id.description: The unique ID of the event to which the line item belongs.

worksheet_id.description: The unique identifier of the worksheet to which the line item belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the line item to retrieve.

name: get_field_by_external_id
description: Retrieves the details of a specific field by its external ID.

external_id.description: The field's external identifier for retrieval.

name: get_field_details_by_id
description: Retrieves the details of an existing field by its internal identifier.

id.description: The internal identifier (int or str) of the field to retrieve.

name: get_field_group_by_id
description: Retrieves details of a specific field group by its unique ID, which supports both string and integer formats.

id.description: Unique identifier of the field group to retrieve.

name: get_performance_review_answer_report_schema
description: Retrieve the schema for performance review answer reports, outlining answer structure, field names, and data types.

name: get_performance_review_report_schema
description: Retrieves the schema for the performance review report, defining the structure, field types, and names of report entries.

name: get_project_by_external_id
description: Retrieves the details of a specific project using its external identifier.

external_id.description: The unique external identifier of the project to retrieve.

name: get_project_details_by_id
description: Retrieves project details using its unique internal identifier.

id.description: The unique internal identifier of the project to retrieve.

name: get_project_fields_description
description: Retrieves a list of available project field names.

name: get_project_milestone_report_schema
description: Retrieves the schema definition for project milestone reports, detailing available fields for rendering forms or parsing data.

name: get_project_report_entries_by_id
description: Retrieve a list of report entries, using the optional `project_report_id` (available from API version 2019-01-01) to scope results to a particular report.

project_report_id.description: Unique identifier of the project report.

name: get_project_report_schema
description: Retrieves the schema definition for project report entries, including metadata about field names and data types.

name: get_project_type_by_id
description: Get detailed project type information by its unique identifier.

id.description: Unique identifier for the project type.

name: get_savings_report_schema
description: Retrieve the savings report schema, which defines the fields and their types for report entries.

name: get_scim_resource_type_by_name
description: Retrieve metadata for a specific SCIM resource type, including its schema, endpoint path, and supported extensions.

resource.description: The name of the SCIM resource type, for example, "User".

name: get_scim_resource_type_metadata_by_name
description: Retrieves schema, endpoint path, and supported extensions for a specific SCIM resource type, providing a subset of the general `/ResourceTypes` endpoint information.

resource.description: The name of the SCIM resource type (e.g., `User`).

name: get_scim_schema_by_uri
description: Retrieves a specific SCIM schema by its URI, providing its structure and metadata, including attributes and constraints, for a SCIM resource type (e.g., User, Group).

uri.description: The Schema URI identifying the SCIM resource type, for example `urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:core:2.0:User`.

name: get_scim_service_provider_config
description: Retrieves the SCIM service provider configuration, providing metadata on supported features and capabilities like patch, filter, bulk, and authentication schemes, as specified in RFC 7643 Section 5.

name: get_scim_user_by_id
description: Retrieves details of a single user by SCIM resource ID, conforming to SCIM 2.0 RFC 7644 Section 3.4.1 and returning user metadata, core attributes, and optional related roles or identifiers.

id.description: The unique SCIM identifier for the user to retrieve.

attributes.description: An optional, comma-separated list of attributes to return in the response, including `userName`, `name.familyName`, `name.givenName`, `roles`, `roles.value`, `externalId`, `active`, `meta.lastModified`, and `meta.created`.

filter.description: An optional filter for user searches, currently not implemented.

name: get_spend_category_by_id
description: Retrieve details for a specific spend category, which classifies organizational spending, using its unique identifier.

external_id.description: Spend category's unique identifier.

name: get_spend_category_details_by_external_id
description: Retrieves the details of an existing spend category using its internal identifier.

id.description: The spend category's internal integer identifier.

name: get_supplier_by_id
description: Retrieve an existing supplier company's details by its unique ID, returning the supplier object if found, or None otherwise.

supplier_id.description: Unique identifier of the supplier company to retrieve.

name: get_supplier_company_by_external_id
description: Retrieves a supplier company by its unique external ID, optionally including related resources via the `include` query parameter.

external_id.description: The required external identifier of the supplier company, for example, `1234-5678-abcd-efgh`.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of related resources to include in the response, chosen from "attachments", "supplier_category", "supplier_groups", "default_payment_term", "payment_types", "default_payment_type", "payment_currencies", "default_payment_currency", and "supplier_classification_values".

name: get_supplier_company_by_id
description: Retrieves an existing supplier company's metadata and linked relationships using its unique identifier, optionally including related resources via the `include` parameter.

id.description: A required, unique integer identifier for the supplier company.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of related resources to include, with allowed values: "attachments", "supplier_category", "supplier_groups", "default_payment_term", "payment_types", "default_payment_type", "payment_currencies", "default_payment_currency", "supplier_classification_values".

name: get_supplier_company_contact_by_id
description: Retrieves an existing supplier company contact's details using company and contact IDs, with optional related resource inclusion.

company_id.description: The unique, internal identifier for the supplier company.

contact_id.description: The unique identifier of the contact, used internally by the system.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of related resources to include in the response (not fully implemented in simulation).

name: get_supplier_company_contacts_by_external_id
description: Retrieve contacts for a supplier company by its external identifier, optionally filtering them, ensuring the external ID matches its creation value.

external_id.description: Required external identifier for the supplier company; for example, "COMP-001".

_include.description: A comma-separated list of related resources to include; currently not fully implemented.

filter.description: An optional dictionary of key-value pairs used to filter contacts.

name: get_supplier_contact_by_external_id
description: Retrieves the full details of an existing supplier contact by external ID, with optional inclusion of related entities.

external_id.description: The required, unique external identifier for the supplier contact, for example `CNT-17`.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of related resources to include in the response, allowing "supplier_company", "contact_types", or "phones".

name: get_supplier_contact_by_id
description: Retrieves full details of an existing supplier contact by ID, optionally including related resources such as contact types, phones, and linked supplier company.

id.description: Required, unique identifier for the supplier contact.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of related resources to include in the response, with allowed values: `supplier_company`, `contact_types`, and `phones`.

name: get_supplier_report_schema
description: Returns the supplier report schema, defining field names, types, and metadata for report entry structure.

name: get_supplier_review_report_schema
description: Returns the schema definition for supplier review reports, detailing the structure of review report entries including field type and name.

name: list_all_attachments_with_filter
description: Returns a list of up to 50 attachments, filterable by the `filter[id_equals]` parameter using a comma-separated string of IDs.

filter_id_equals.description: A comma-separated string of attachment IDs to filter results; defaults to `None`, which returns all attachments up to the limit.

name: list_all_bid_line_items
description: Returns a list of all bid line items, with optional filtering by specific criteria.

filter.description: A dictionary of field-value pairs to filter bid line items by exact match, such as `{"bid_id": 123, "status": "active"}`, defaulting to `None` to return all items.

name: list_all_suppliers
description: Returns a list of all supplier companies from the simulation database, without filtering or pagination.

name: list_attachments_by_ids
description: Retrieve a filtered list of attachments by ID, with a maximum limit of 50 per request.

filter_id_equals.description: A comma-separated string of attachment IDs to filter by.

name: list_award_line_items_for_award
description: Retrieve line items associated with a specific award.

award_id.description: The unique identifier of the award to retrieve line items for.

filter_is_quoted_equals.description: Filters line items by their quoted status: `True` for quoted items, `False` for non-quoted items.

filter_line_item_type_equals.description: Filter award line items by type; valid types are "STANDARD", "GOODS", or "SERVICES".

_include.description: Specifies a related resource ("supplier_company" or "worksheet") to include with the primary resource.

name: list_awards_with_filters
description: Retrieve a list of awards by supporting combined filtering on state and update timestamps.

filter_state_equals.description: A list of states to filter awards by, including `draft`, `confirmed`, `awaiting_requisition_sync`, and `requisition_created`.

filter_updated_at_from.description: Specifies the earliest update timestamp for awards to include.

filter_updated_at_to.description: Filters awards updated on or before this timestamp.

name: list_bid_line_items_for_bid
description: Returns a list of line items associated with the specified bid ID.

bid_id.description: The bid's unique identifier for retrieving line items.

name: list_contact_types
description: Retrieves a list of all contact types in the system.

name: list_contract_award_line_items
description: Retrieves a list of line items for a contract award, detailing its components.

award_id.description: The unique identifier of the award to retrieve its line items.

name: list_contract_awards
description: Retrieves a list of all contract awards from the Workday Strategic Sourcing system, including comprehensive associated data and configurations.

name: list_contract_milestone_report_entries
description: Retrieves paginated contract milestone report entries for tracking progress and performance across contracts.

name: list_contract_types
description: Retrieve a list of all available contract types.

name: list_contracts
description: Retrieve a list of contracts, supporting filtering by any contract attribute, relationship inclusion, and pagination.

filter.description: A dictionary of criteria to filter contracts, supporting range-based, string pattern, value equality, and presence checks for various contract attributes.

updated_at_from.description: Timestamp for filtering contracts updated on or after.

updated_at_to.description: Filters contracts updated on or before the specified timestamp.

number_from.description: Find contracts with a number greater than or equal to the specified value.

number_to.description: Filters contracts where the number is less than or equal to the specified value.

title_contains.description: Return contracts with title containing the specified string.

title_not_contains.description: Return contracts with titles not containing the specified string.

description_contains.description: The string to search for within contract descriptions.

description_not_contains.description: Filters contracts where the description does not contain the specified string.

external_id_empty.description: Filter contracts to return only those with a blank `external_id`.

external_id_not_empty.description: Filter for contracts with a non-blank external ID.

external_id_equals.description: Retrieves contracts by a specific external ID.

external_id_not_equals.description: Find contracts excluding the specified external ID.

actual_start_date_from.description: Filters contracts by their start date, including those on or after the specified date.

actual_start_date_to.description: Return contracts started on or before date.

actual_end_date_from.description: Filters contracts that ended on or after the specified date.

actual_end_date_to.description: A date string; returns contracts with an actual end date on or before this date.

actual_spend_amount_from.description: Return contracts with spend greater than or equal to the specified amount.

actual_spend_amount_to.description: Return contracts with an `actual_spend_amount` less than or equal to the specified amount.

auto_renewal.description: Auto-renewal mode(s), as a list of 'yes', 'no', or 'evergreen'.

needs_attention_equals.description: A boolean value to filter contracts by their 'needs attention' status.

needs_attention_not_equals.description: Returns contracts where the `needs_attention` status is not equal to the specified boolean value.

renew_number_of_times_from.description: Filters contracts to include those renewing at least the specified number of times.

renew_number_of_times_to.description: Filter contracts that renew up to the specified number of times.

state_equals.description: A list of strings to find contracts with specified states.

terminated_note_contains.description: The string to search for within a contract's termination note.

terminated_note_not_contains.description: Filters contracts where the termination note does not contain the specified string.

terminated_note_empty.description: Filters contracts to include only those with an empty termination note.

terminated_note_not_empty.description: Includes contracts that have a non-empty termination note.

terminated_reason_contains.description: Return contracts with termination reason containing string.

terminated_reason_not_contains.description: Filters contracts where the termination reason does not contain the provided string.

terminated_reason_empty.description: A string parameter that filters contracts for an empty termination reason.

terminated_reason_not_empty.description: Includes contracts with a non-empty termination reason.

contract_type_id_equals.description: Filters contracts by a specified contract type ID.

contract_type_id_not_equals.description: Return contracts with a contract type ID not equal to the given integer.

marked_as_needs_attention_at_from.description: Return contracts marked as needing attention on or after the specified date.

marked_as_needs_attention_at_to.description: Find contracts marked as needs attention before the specified date.

needs_attention_note_contains.description: Filters contracts where the `needs_attention_note` contains the specified string.

needs_attention_note_not_contains.description: Matches contracts where the needs attention note does not contain the provided string.

needs_attention_note_empty.description: Includes contracts with an empty needs attention note.

needs_attention_note_not_empty.description: Return contracts with a non-empty needs attention note.

needs_attention_reason_contains.description: The string to search for within the contract's needs attention reason.

needs_attention_reason_not_contains.description: Return contracts where the needs attention reason does not contain the specified string.

needs_attention_reason_empty.description: Filters contracts to include those with an empty needs attention reason (string parameter).

needs_attention_reason_not_empty.description: Return contracts with a non-empty needs attention reason.

renewal_termination_notice_date_from.description: Find contracts with a termination notice date on or after the specified date.

renewal_termination_notice_date_to.description: Return contracts where the termination notice date is less than or equal to the specified date.

renewal_termination_reminder_date_from.description: Return contracts with termination reminder date on or after the specified date.

renewal_termination_reminder_date_to.description: Contracts with a termination reminder date on or before the specified date.

spend_category_id_equals.description: A list of Spend Category IDs to filter contracts.

_include.description: A comma-separated list of relationships to include in the response, supporting `contract_type`, `spend_category`, `supplier_company`, `docusign_envelopes`, and `adobe_sign_agreements`.

page.description: A dictionary specifying pagination parameters, including `size` (int) for the number of results per page (default: 10, max: 100).

size.description: Number of results per page (default: 10, max: 100).

name: list_custom_fields
description: List all custom fields, optionally filtered by specified criteria.

filter.description: A dictionary for filtering fields by `group_id_equals` (string) or `target_object_equals` (string); returns all fields if `None`.

group_id_equals.description: The ID of the group for selecting fields.

target_object_equals.description: The target class name for filtering custom fields.

name: list_event_bids
description: Return a list of bids for the specified event, restricted to events of type RFP, with support for filtering, pagination, and optional data inclusion.

event_id.description: The unique identifier of the event for bid retrieval.

filter.description: A dictionary containing filter criteria for bids, where keys define filter fields and values (integers, booleans, strings, or lists of strings) specify the criteria, supporting filtering by ID, status, intent to bid, timestamps, and supplier company details.

id_equals.description: Filters bids by a specific ID.

intend_to_bid_equals.description: Filters bids by the specified boolean 'intent to bid' status.

intend_to_bid_not_equals.description: Return bids where the 'intent to bid' status is not equal to the specified boolean value.

intend_to_bid_answered_at_from.description: Filters bids where `intend_to_bid` was updated on or after the specified timestamp.

intend_to_bid_answered_at_to.description: Filters bids where `intend_to_bid` was updated on or before the timestamp.

submitted_at_from.description: Filters bids where `submitted_at` is on or after the specified timestamp.

submitted_at_to.description: Filter bids submitted on or before a specified timestamp string.

resubmitted_at_from.description: A timestamp for returning bids where `resubmitted_at` is on or after this value.

resubmitted_at_to.description: A timestamp string to filter bids where `resubmitted_at` is on or before this time.

status_equals.description: A list of statuses to find bids by, including: `award_retracted`, `awarded`, `draft`, `rejected`, `rejection_retracted`, `resubmitted`, `revising`, `submitted`, `unclaimed`, or `update_requested`.

supplier_company_id_equals.description: Filters bids by specific supplier company IDs.

supplier_company_external_id_equals.description: A specific Supplier Company External ID to find bids by.

_include.description: A string to include additional related resources: `event` for event details or `supplier_company` for supplier company details. Defaults to `None`.

page.description: A dictionary containing pagination parameters, specifically `size` (int) for the number of results per page (default: 10, max: 100).

size.description: The number of results returned per page, defaulting to 10 with a maximum of 100.

name: list_event_report_entries
description: Retrieves a paginated list of event report entries, detailed records of system events (e.g., audit events, workflow triggers, system updates), supporting traversal through `next` and `prev` links.

name: list_event_templates
description: Return a list of all event templates.

name: list_event_worksheet_line_items
description: Retrieve line items by event ID and worksheet ID.

event_id.description: The unique identifier for the event associated with the line items.

worksheet_id.description: The unique ID of the worksheet containing the line items.

name: list_event_worksheets
description: List all worksheets for a specified event.

event_id.description: The unique identifier of the event to which the worksheets belong.

name: list_events_with_filters
description: Get a list of events based on specified criteria.

filter.description: A dictionary mapping event attributes to values for filtering, supporting various criteria like date ranges, string containment, exact matches, and emptiness checks.

updated_at_from.description: A timestamp to return events updated on or after.

updated_at_to.description: Return events updated on or before the given timestamp string.

title_contains.description: A string for filtering events where the title contains it.

title_not_contains.description: A string for filtering events, excluding those with titles containing this value.

spend_category_id_equals.description: A list of integer Spend Category IDs to find events.

state_equals.description: The states to match for events: 'draft', 'scheduled', 'published', 'live_editing', 'closed', 'canceled'.

event_type_equals.description: Filters events by type, accepting a list of values: 'RFP', 'AUCTION', 'AUCTION_WITH_LOTS', 'AUCTION_LOT', 'PERFORMANCE_REVIEW_EVENT', 'PERFORMANCE_REVIEW_SCORE_CARD_ONLY_EVENT', 'SUPPLIER_REVIEW_EVENT', 'SUPPLIER_REVIEW_MASTER_EVENT'.

request_type_equals.description: A list of strings specifying event request types to match.

supplier_rsvp_deadline_from.description: A date string for filtering events with an RSVP deadline on or after the specified date.

supplier_rsvp_deadline_to.description: Filters events to include those with an RSVP deadline on or before the specified date.

supplier_rsvp_deadline_empty.description: Filters for events with an unset RSVP deadline.

supplier_rsvp_deadline_not_empty.description: Indicates whether to include events with a set RSVP deadline.

supplier_question_deadline_from.description: Filter events with a questions deadline on or after this date.

supplier_question_deadline_to.description: Filters events where the questions deadline is on or before the specified date.

supplier_question_deadline_empty.description: Return events with questions deadline not set.

supplier_question_deadline_not_empty.description: Filters for events with a questions deadline set.

bid_submission_deadline_from.description: Events with a bid deadline on or after the specified date.

bid_submission_deadline_to.description: A date string that filters events with a bid deadline on or before this date.

bid_submission_deadline_empty.description: Return events with bid deadline not set.

bid_submission_deadline_not_empty.description: Filters events with a set bid deadline.

created_at_from.description: A timestamp for filtering events created on or after.

created_at_to.description: Filters events created on or before the specified timestamp.

published_at_from.description: A timestamp string to filter events published on or after.

published_at_to.description: A timestamp to return events published on or before.

published_at_empty.description: Return events without a published timestamp.

published_at_not_empty.description: Returns events with a published timestamp.

closed_at_from.description: Return events closed on or after the specified timestamp.

closed_at_to.description: A timestamp string for filtering events closed on or before.

closed_at_empty.description: Returns events without a closed timestamp.

closed_at_not_empty.description: Return events with a closed timestamp.

spend_amount_from.description: Return events with a spend amount greater than or equal to the specified float value.

spend_amount_to.description: A float representing the maximum spend amount for events to return.

spend_amount_empty.description: Returns events without a spend amount.

spend_amount_not_empty.description: Includes events with a spend amount set.

external_id_empty.description: A filter to return events with a blank `external_id`.

external_id_not_empty.description: Indicates whether to return events with a non-blank external ID.

external_id_equals.description: Filters events by a specific external ID.

external_id_not_equals.description: Excludes events that match the specified external ID string.

page.description: A dictionary for pagination, containing the `size` (int) of results per page (default: 10, max: 100).

size.description: Specifies the number of results per page, defaulting to 10 with a maximum of 100.

name: list_field_groups
description: Returns a list of field groups.

name: list_field_options_by_field_id
description: Return a list of field options for the specified field.

field_id.description: A unique identifier for the field to retrieve options.

name: list_payment_currencies
description: Retrieves all available payment currencies.

name: list_payment_terms
description: Retrieves a list of all available payment terms in the system.

name: list_payment_types
description: Retrieve a list of all available payment types in the system.

name: list_performance_review_answer_report_entries
description: Retrieves a list of performance review answer entries, supporting pagination via `next` and `prev` links.

name: list_performance_review_report_entries
description: Retrieves detailed, paginated performance review report entries, where each entry contains performance review attributes and supports iteration via pagination links.

name: list_project_milestone_report_entries
description: Retrieves a list of project milestone report entries, each detailing project milestones.

name: list_project_types
description: Retrieves a list of all available project types, each including a name and a short code.

name: list_projects
description: Retrieve a list of projects based on optional filtering criteria and pagination settings.

filter.description: A dictionary specifying supported criteria for filtering projects.

updated_at_from.description: A `datetime` timestamp to filter projects updated on or after this value.

updated_at_to.description: A timestamp to filter projects updated on or before.

number_from.description: Return projects with a number equal to or greater than the specified integer.

number_to.description: Projects with a number less than or equal to the specified value.

title_contains.description: Filters projects by titles that contain the provided string.

title_not_contains.description: A string to exclude projects whose titles contain it.

description_contains.description: Filters projects by a string contained within their description.

description_not_contains.description: A string for excluding projects whose descriptions contain this value.

external_id_not_empty.description: Returns projects with non-blank external IDs.

external_id_equals.description: Find projects by a specific external ID.

external_id_not_equals.description: Excludes projects with the specified external ID.

actual_start_date_from.description: Filters projects with an actual start date on or after the specified `date`.

actual_start_date_to.description: Filters projects by an actual start date on or before the specified date.

actual_end_date_from.description: Return projects ended on or after the specified date.

actual_end_date_to.description: Return projects with an actual end date on or before the specified date.

target_start_date_from.description: The earliest target start date for projects to include.

target_start_date_to.description: Filters projects targeted to start on or before the specified date.

target_end_date_from.description: Projects with a target end date on or after the specified date.

target_end_date_to.description: The `date` on or before which projects must be targeted to end.

actual_spend_amount_from.description: Filters projects by actual spend amount equal to or greater than the specified value.

actual_spend_amount_to.description: Projects with an actual spend amount less than or equal to this value.

approved_spend_amount_from.description: Filters projects where the approved spend amount is at least the specified value.

approved_spend_amount_to.description: Filters projects where the approved spend amount is less than or equal to this value.

estimated_savings_amount_from.description: Specifies the minimum estimated savings amount for projects.

estimated_savings_amount_to.description: The maximum estimated savings amount (float) for filtering projects.

estimated_spend_amount_from.description: Filters projects with an estimated spend amount equal to or greater than the specified value.

estimated_spend_amount_to.description: Filters projects by an estimated spend amount up to the specified amount.

canceled_note_contains.description: A string that filters projects by matching content within their cancellation note.

canceled_note_not_contains.description: Filters projects where the cancelation note does not contain the specified string.

canceled_note_empty.description: Filter projects with an empty cancelation note, accepting a string value.

canceled_note_not_empty.description: Return projects with a non-empty cancelation note.

canceled_reason_contains.description: Filters projects where the cancelation reason contains the specified string.

canceled_reason_not_contains.description: Filters projects where the cancelation reason does not contain the specified string.

canceled_reason_empty.description: Return projects with an empty cancelation reason.

canceled_reason_not_empty.description: Filters projects that have a non-empty cancelation reason.

needs_attention_reason_not_contains.description: A string to filter projects where the 'needs attention' reason does not contain this value.

needs_attention_reason_not_empty.description: Filters projects to include those with a non-empty 'needs attention' reason.

page.description: A dictionary for pagination settings, including a `'size'` parameter to limit results per page (default: 10, max: 100); use `None` for no pagination.

name: list_savings_report_entries

name: list_scim_resource_types

name: list_scim_schemas

name: list_scim_users

name: list_spend_categories
